pkgmetadata.longdescription:
Swaylock is a screen locking utility for Wayland compositors. It is compatible with any Wayland compositor which implements the following Wayland protocols: wlr-layer-shell, wlr-input-inhibitor, xdg-output, xdg-shell.
Swaylock is the official screen locker for gui-wm/sway.
Swaylock-plugin is a fork of Swaylock that allows animated backgrounds like screensavers.
